Origin Story

The Dawn - Ake (明け)

How did Mimi get lost on the Solana blockchain? It all started when a visionary storyteller was just about to finish his comic series, with Mimi as the main character. He crafted Mimi as being mystic, mysterious and mercurial, but then she really took on a mind of her own.

As the sun was setting, the storyteller took the final stroke of his brush, satisfied to have finished his comic. After letting the paint dry overnight, he returned at dawn to review his work. Astonished - he noted that Mimi had disappeared from all of her scenes. Where had she gone? Had she been banished by an enemy or left in search of a lover, a friend or a conquest?

The reason Mimi transported to the treacherous Solana blockchain is not understood, but what is clear is that she must learn to survive. Does she find a Clan to pledge her allegiance, evolve mystical powers or become a tribal elder? Her future and survival is dictated by her NFT holder.

MIMI METAVERSE

Mimi will voyage to three areas in the Metaverse in order to fully evolve into her final state. She will first be assigned a CLAN by the Solana gods at “The Temple”. She will then venture to “The Dojo” to be assigned her CRAFT. Finally, she must consult “The Swirling Pools” to learn of her CASTE.

Her survival and success depends on the decisions of her holder.

CLAN

CRAFT

CASTE

Roadmap

Find out what is beyond the horizon for the Mystic Mimi Collection.

PHASE I - MIMI LANDS IN THE METAVERSE!

Mimi transports to the Solana network. She has transported from one of her many scenes in the original anime series, so finds herself wearing the associated outfit.

PHASE II - “THE TEMPLE”

Mimi will firstly visit “The Temple” to be assigned a CLAN.

Every NFT holder will be airdropped a token which allows them to trade in their original NFT for a CLAN revealed NFT. This will have improved artwork, CLAN insignia and relevant colours. A community for each CLAN will be launched for CLAN business.

PHASE III - “THE DOJO”

This is where Mimi will learn her CRAFT.

Each NFT holder will again be able to merge their NFT for incorporate CRAFT accessories. After this, we will airdrop resources specific to each CRAFT. These can be traded on secondary markets, but make sure your CLAN is well equipped for “The War of the Clans”.

PHASE IV - “THE SWIRLING POOLS”

At “The Swirling Pools” stories are told and legends are made. Should Mimi become a village elder, she will gain more influence in her CLAN. However, she has to use this wisely or risk revolt.

Holders will be assigned a CASTE, this is the final evolution of artwork and attributes.

PHASE V - THE WAR OF THE CLANS

A play-to-earn game will be created to allow Mimi holders to battle or trade between CLANS, evolve their CRAFT and re-elect leaders to increase their CASTE. The Mimi Metaverse will include its own currency, which can be earned, looted or wagered in the metaverse and finally sold on the secondary market for profit.

PHASE VI - HANGOUTS AND STAKING

We will acquire land on the Solana Metaverse to bring together the community, create a space for duels, trading and wagering, hangouts, and CLAN business meetings.

We are currently looking into developing staking pools where holders can stake their Mimi NFT for a lock period, in return for the Mimi Metaverse currency.

FAQS

Get all the answers to your Frequently Asked Questions here.

Official launch plans and prices have not yet been announced. Follow us on Twitter or join our Discord to stay up to date with details on our official launch.

You will be able to mint an NFT on this website once launch plans have been announced. All you have to do is connect your Solana compatible wallet and mint - it is that easy!

There will be 888 Mystic Mimi NFTs in this collection.

Each NFT will cost 0.88 SOL

8 is considered a lucky number - and Mimi is very superstitious.

Whitelist is available for members of our Discord server. We will reward active members who contribute to making our community feel inclusive and enjoyable with whitelist spots. This will reserve people the ability to mint our NFTs early.

Every NFT holder will be airdropped a token. This token will be used to merge the NFT on our website. This process will be explained fully when the tokens are airdropped.

Mystic Mimi 2022

CLAN

There will be three CLANS; the Underworld, the Heavens, and the Lands. Clans must learn to act as a community if they wish to dominate the Metaverse. Led by their CASTE leaders and using their individual's specific CRAFT will be vital to their survival.

Each NFT will be merged so that every Mimi’s CLAN allegiance will be easily identifiable.

Return

CRAFT

Each Mimi will receive her CRAFT at “The Dojo” - a historic site where the fiercest warriors are forged, the most cunning of diplomats hone their skills, and the most wicked witches and wizards are taught.

Each NFT will be further developed to demonstrate her specific craft. This will add extra rarity and value to each NFT as every CLAN depends upon their CRAFTs powers for success.

Return

CASTE

As Mimi ventures to “The Swirling Pools”, she will learn her CASTE. This is her position of seniority in her CLAN. The village elders will carry the most respect and have the most influence (or voting rights) in their CLAN. However, a mutiny from tribal warriors, an embargo from diplomats or a curse from witches will easily overturn this control.

The hierarchy gives more voting rights to the NFT holder, granting them more influence within the Mystic Mimi Collection. The final stage of Mimi’s journey to “The Swirling Pools” will reveal the true value of each NFT, rewarding holders greatly.

Return
